item.title: I live in a sitcom
item.description: I walk into the living room with my e-book reader in my hand and think aloud: - This is the best investment I have ever made in my life. My wife looks at me like saying, - What?. Then I realize she is waiting for an answer: - Marrying you babe, marrying you, is the best investment I have ever made. And having bought this Kindle.
